name: Convergence (Perichron Interactive)
description:
What if, somewhere out there, was a world just like Earth? Convergence is a short story-- playable in about 10-15 minutes-- in the form of four minigames. It explores the question of what happens when far, far away turns out to be closer to home than we were expecting.

Originally created for round 6 of the GameMaker Community's GMC Jam, in which it won the award for Best Story.

Trailer music: "Floating Cities" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
